description: Anatine is a pixelated metroidvania game that contains organic musical elements. Play the flute to interact with the environment or unleash powerful magic! In the dangerous world of Avenis, battle against the Eidolons and confront powerful enemies to uncover the many secrets of this lost world.

name: Grow Light
description: A short game about a botanist banished to the moon for attempting to create sentient plant life. They move through the sections of their circular lunar base, talking to plants, drinking tea, reading old personal logs, and meditating on rejection and isolation.

name: Wogger
description: The complete story of woggers adventures is waiting for you! 12 levels lead you through woggers own world and strange creatures will appear. Sometimes it might be easy sometimes it can be very tuff to find a solution.

name: The Riftbreaker: Gold Edition
description: The Riftbreaker Gold Edition contains the core game and all available addons.

name: Hit the Color
description: Hit the right color to progress to the next point and earn more score.

name: Hypertension
description: Hypertension is the speedy challenging reflex game developed by Erik Games

name: Arcade Archives: Strato Fighter
description:
"STRATO FIGHTER" is a shooter released by TECMO in 1991.
In the year 2135 AD, the Earth Military mobilizes Codename "RAIGA" after an attack by an unknown enemy.
The future is in the hands of the two MB-OG fighters, and they depart for the enemy colony.
Use the turn button and a variety of weapons to take down enemies that come at you from all sides - vertically and horizontally.

name: Retro Space
description:
In this space shooter game your goal is to destroy all the invaders and get the best score.
Inspired by a famous game (Space Impact), Retro Space has 8 levels and 8 bosses.
With a more colorful and modern look, you will remember what it was like to play on an old cell phone.

name: Persona 4 Arena Ultimax: P4A Story
description: P4A Story (Persona 4 Arena Story) is a paid DLC for Persona 4 Arena Ultimax. This DLC enables you to play through the story of the original Persona 4 Arena with updated Persona 4 Arena Ultimax gameplay.

name: 80s Mania Wrestling Returns
description: 80s Mania Wrestling Returns is a totally radical pro wrestling manager game and wrestling booker game presented as a collectible card game! And it's set in the 1980s and 1990s!

name: AI Arena
description: AI Arena is a groundbreaking game that combines human and AI collaboration. Through a process called Imitation Learning, players transfer their skills to an AI, which then competes on their behalf. With a neural network embedded in their character, players can continuously improve their AI's skills. AI Arena is skill-based and offers limitless potential for AI development and competitive eSports. It aims to make AI more accessible, approachable, and foster AI literacy among the general public.

name: Paradise Café
description: An early open world/sandbox game released only in Portugal in 1985 whose controversial status (involving sex, violence and drugs) and crude humour allowed it to become the most famous game ZX Spectrum game created in the country.

name: Spite & Malice
description: Play North Sky Games’ brand new Spite & Malice game, also known as Skip-Bo and Cat and Mouse. Play all the cards from your payoff piles before your opponent and win the match! With a host of unique game variants, including Kings and Misery, and 4 challenging levels of difficulty, Spite & Malice offers an unparalleled game play experience!

name: Corpse
description:
Explore and manage your resources in a short yet bizarre game

Wander through the streets of the town and search CORPSE fragments to lift the curse.

Check your inventory and you may find key information on how to escape this nightmare.

name: The Dunkening
description:
This is 30 minute long light horror (not that spooky in my opinion) that is not meant to be taken seriously, it's a joke game with some dumb jokes in it that hopefully will everyone enjoy it.

In game you can turn off all VHS effects and it has FoV slider from 30-120V, changing these settings may result in some graphical stuff but most likely won't.

name: Atlantis: Alien Space Shooter
description:
You are Earth's last hope!
Entrusted with the most advanced submarines, your mission is to defend humanity against swarms of alien monsters emerged from the oceans.
Shower the enemies with rains of bullets while dodging their vicious attacks with your masterful maneuvers. Recover treasured technology from the lost civilization of Atlantis to power up your fleet.

name: Galaxiga Arcade Shooting Game
description: Galaxiga: Classic Arcade Space Shooter is an arcade space shooting 80s game that makes you feel like you are playing a Galaga classic game on mobile. If you are a big fan of arcade retro shooter games like Galaxia, Galaxian, Galaga & Galactica with new modern shooting way and want to give freedom to galactic games, then Galaxiga: Classic Arcade Space Shooter is the perfect game for you.

name: Bubble Shooter: Jungle Pop
description: Match 3 colors and Clear Levels. Bubble Shooter is a classic puzzle game with simple rules that players of all ages can enjoy!

name: Fire Ride: Ball game
description: Launch fireball into the geometric cave to score points! Play free fire ball game Increase your combo, and gain score with style! One-tap easy-to-learn controls, rich visual effects, and addictive game-play mechanics.

name: WindWings: Space Shooter
description: Android space shooter upgrading game.

name: Nigepico 1.2
description: A remake of the first game released by Gotmail, featuring an English language option and different puzzles. The player must escape a hair salon after falling asleep.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Sindacco Chronicles
description: 1998. A new Mafia war is on the rise in Liberty City — the Sindacco, Forelli and Leone families are at their throats again for domination over the worst city in America. The Sindaccos, led by the ambitious Paulie Sindacco, plan to conquer what they can before the others can get their hands on what’s left of the city. A loyal henchman they have, Joseph Daniel O’Toole, is supposed to infiltrate the Leone Family. Meanwhile, Paulie’s two nephews, Frank and Marcus, are preparing their men for a big war…

name: Slime Evolutionary Path
description:
An indie game created by only 1 person. This is an idle game that is relaxed and casual

As a slime, you have the ability to evolve and you can choose different evolutionary paths. Also, there are different enchantments of equipment, use them to defeat powerful enemies!

name: Tavern Rumble: Roguelike Card
description:
Tavern Rumble is a Free Strategy Roguelike Deckbuilding Card Games

Start your adventure with basic mercenary cards, fight your way up, get loot and strengthen your deck to fight strong Bosses along the way.

name: Trailpa
description:
Trailpa is simple minimalist puzzle game.

Calm and relaxing puzzle game to challenge your brain.

name: Army Defence
description: It’s a desperate mission that only the brave and resourceful will survive: Your base is under attack and the enemy are pressing in on all sides. Only you and your tiny squad of special forces operatives can save the day, so parachute in and prepare to defend using everything you can get your hands on in this all-action tower defense game.

name: OrderZero
description:
You are a pretty girl who received an unknown mission.
You've crashlanded in the middle of nowhere, and all communication is down.
With just one single weapon, you must make your way out of this place overflowing with enemies. Be careful, as you will have to start from the very beginning if you fail.

name: Dash.io
description: Are you the Survivor that everyone needs? Or the hero that everyone wants? Shoot your way through Legend of Heroes, a roguelike action RPG game beyond your wildest dreams! Equip mega powerful crossbows, hunt enemies with your greatsword, max out your stats and shoot monsters in this thrilling, high-octane soul style action RPG game!

name: Who Are You!?
description: 'Who Are You!?' is a strong narrative first person sci-fi psychological horror videogame, where you will play as Ray Roswell, traveling through his distorted memories and solving puzzles to understand what is real about his wife’s disappearance 20 years ago.

name: Infinite Knights
description:
The one who pull the sword, will become the king and lead the knights to defeat devils.

Are you the one, who can pull up the sword?

name: ISEPS Idle Particle Simulator
description: Create beautiful particle systems with tons of colors, patterns, and attributes and see them grow and move around in real-time!

name: Spark
description: Spark is an idle incremental game in which you take on the role of an ethereal Spark of Life that pops into existence. Gather the raw material that exists around you and use your influence to guide the evolution of both the Cosmos and yourself.

name: Space shooter: Galaxy Attack
description: If you are a big fan of arcade shooting game with the new modern combat, and want to bring the freedom in the galaxy games, so Space shooter: Galaxy attack is perfect game for you. With classic free space games genre, old game with a new context, Space shooter: Galaxy attack puts you on fire with infinity space shooting. You will be faced lots of evil enemies and deal with many striker bosses in galaxy wars. Are you sure you will survival in the war of alien shooter?

name: Sex Story: Ruby and Hunter - Episode 4
description: An erotic Visual Novel featuring HD graphics, set in beautiful decor. The Sex Story continues with Ruby's perspective, as she decides to antagonize Hunter and test the limits of his possessiveness by fooling around with the pool boy right in front of him.

name: BubbleTT: Oh! My Fart
description:
How long can you farting? Challenge yourself now, laugh out loudly and cheer up your day! You can even challenge your friends and family! Share the Nomination Screenshot Today!
Test your swiftness of sight and hearing to become next fart master! You got some warm gas inside the body and needed to let it out silently. Fart is funny, let’s farting for fun!

name: JEFN
description: Catch all the flies before your friends, be the winner and draw a unique picture for them in this funny party game for 2-4 player.

name: Nova Dash
description: Nova Dash is a crazy action puzzle platformer, which throws you into space with the fun loving Gopas, cute little characters from the outer galaxy. Your goal is to rescue them from the exploding sun, avoiding all sorts of obstacles, from forcefields and aliens to frozen planets, meteor attacks, exploding planets and more!

name: CatHotel
description:
Manage your very own cattery:
Mrs. Miller has to go on an urgent business trip and the Smith family are looking for accommodation for their house cat while they're on vacation.
Your cattery is the purrfect place for them! Care for the kitties, feed them and play with them until their owners come to pick them up again.

name: Flying Unicorn
description:
Flying Unicorn is a side-scrolling mobile game featuring "retro" 2D graphics.
This game is extremely easy to fly, just tap the screen to flap the unicorns wings. While it's easy to fly, it is not easy to play. Don't fly into castle towers.
The unicorn briefly flaps upward each time the player taps the screen, and the player is scored on the number of towers sets the unicorn successfully passes through.

name: DeliCat
description:
Take to the skies and join the ultimate food delivery team!
As a daring cat, quirky chameleon or loyal dog, fly your drone to deliver mouth-watering meals to hungry customers!
Earn cash for each successful delivery and use it to unlock new animals and gear: powerful drones, cool glasses, stylish hats and more!
Featuring intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, DeliCat will keep you hooked for hours! Complete tricky levels in Career mode or beat your friend's high score in the endless High-flyer mode!
But that's not all - DeliCat also features a variety of challenges that you can complete to unlock additional rewards! With each new challenge, you'll become a more skilled pilot, able to navigate the alley with ease and deliver meals faster than ever before!
So, are you ready to take on the ultimate food delivery challenge in this action-packed arcade game? Join the DeliCat crew and take your place among the elite team of animal drone pilots!

name: Sandbox Planet
description:
Simulate real solar system
Emulate universe develop, build any planet you want.
Highly customizable, bulid your own solar system.

name: Tap Boutique
description:
Express your sassy style sense with Tap Boutique!
Own a fashion boutique and customize it with style! Dress up your avatar and create unique looks with the latest and trendiest fashion.
Works great with iPhone 6S and 6S Plus!

name: What's Cooking?: Tasty Chef
description: Tie your apron and sharpen your knives – it’s time for a crazy cooking adventure in What's Cooking?: Tasty Chef! Starting as an amateur cook with a small kitchen, you’ll combine ingredients to create over 1000 recipes and serve delicious dishes to hungry customers. Customize your restaurant, upgrade your kitchen and improve your skills to become the world’s greatest master chef!

name: Tall Ships: Age of Sail
description:
Tall Ships: Age of Sail is an action-packed game simulating naval combat in the age of sail. The player commands his ship and fights in a series of campaign battles set in the Mediterranean Sea during 1805. As the campaign progresses, the player will take command of larger and more capable ships while fighting an even more capable enemy.
Tall Ships is an immersive 3D game which utilizes the accelerometer to control movement and standard iPhone gestures to change the view of the battle.

name: Queued
description: Queued is an endless game with challenges, modes and nice music. You need to tap on the correct color button to match the first shape lined up in the queue. However, the time bar is running down, but the good news is tabbed correct will add back some points to it, and keep concentration while playing to avoid the wrong tabbed. How many shapes you can dequeue?

name: Neogen BeatZ
description:
Neogen Beatz is a crazy synergy of Music and a Ground Breaking Arcade Game!
Neogen Beatz is an arcade with neon lights, fluid gameplay and high speeds and all interacting as one with the mesmeric visual style and accompanying music.
Choose Your Favorite track from Your device and Feel how the Music pulses through the astonishing unique neon backgrounds, while you are playing the game.
Match the neon figures as they fallout, with the cells in the bottom, test your reaction and beat the highscores to unlock new modes.

name: PxBeats
description: A perfect mix of RPG and music games.

name: Slashy Chords: Guitar Warriors
description: Protect the world of harmony from the monstrous hordes of dissonance with the power of music! Play a real guitar or strum a screen guitar to defeat the forces of discord!

name: Tempo Nuts
description:
Tap to shoot nuts into screws at the right time. Watch out! If you miss one time, you will fail the level!
How many nuts can you product?

name: Music Puzzle
description:
You've never played a game like this one. Music Puzzle is a unique gaming experience, where you arrange songs from famous artists around the world. Each puzzle reflects a part of a song and contains various tracks representing different instruments.

Guitars, drums, voices or more exotic instruments like congas and the tambourine, it is your turn to listen to them carefully and sort them in the right order.
You can always listen to the original and compare it with your current progress. Use your ears and improve your hearing abilities to master the game. Different game modes and challenges will provide hours of gameplay with your favorite songs. Are you able to solve a puzzle with only a limited number of moves? Can you achieve the blind modes?

name: Fatty Fight
description: Embark on a thrilling PvP adventure in Fatty Fight! Dive into the captivating world of strategic matching and intense battles where your skills will be put to the test. Match blocks, charge up your heroes, and lead your team to victory against formidable opponents. Are you ready for the ultimate battle?

name: Arcane Pets: Plushie Empire
description:
Arcane Pets introduces the sequel mini-game, Plushie Empire.
Become an overnight entrepreneur and build your empire into a business tycoon. Rake in the Empire Coins and Empire Cash. Compete against a plethora of online players to become the richest Empire out there. Swim in the Empire Cash and get empire-rich.
As a semi-idle game, your Empire will continuously sell the Plushies that you produce & ship.

name: Sons of Saturn
description: Sons of Saturn is an adventure game focused on atmosphere and narrative, brought to life using photos of real life abandoned locations as assets. Experience both wonder and horror as you explore the underground city of Minerva, where the dead dream and memories cling to life.

name: Exoprimal: Deadeye QB-W Set
description: This set includes five cosmetic items for the Assault-type exosuit Deadeye -- known for its ability to skillfully slay dinosaurs from a distance with its rifle. Daily training is imperative for survival! Equip these cosmetic items and lead your team to victory!

name: Exoprimal: Zephyr Security Guard Set
description: This set includes five cosmetic items for the Assault-type exosuit Zephyr -- known to leverage its mobility and stylishly slay enemies. This guard instantly detects all types of danger! Equip these cosmetic items and keep your teammates safe!

name: Exoprimal: Roadblock Tragic Monster Set
description: This set includes five cosmetic items for the Tank-type exosuit Roadblock -- known for protecting allies with its massive shield. Transform into a horrifying monster and unleash your wrath on enemies and opponents alike! Equip these cosmetic items and command everyone's attention!

name: Exoprimal: Barrage Splash! Set
description: This set includes five cosmetic items for the Assault-type exosuit Barrage -- known for lighting the battlefield ablaze with grenades. Make a splash in the heat of battle with this cool cosmetic set as you engulf your enemies in flames!

name: Exoprimal: Witchdoctor UFO Set
description: This set includes five cosmetic items for the Support-type exosuit Witchdoctor -- known for delivering shocking blows to enemies and repairing squadmates. Equip these cosmetic items and leap around the battlefield as a UFO. You'll be sure to stand out!

name: Last Bloody Snack
description: Last Bloody Snack tells the story of a boy named Cody, who suffers from severe psychological disorders and has visions of a monster that will try to eliminate everything he hates. The game explores a strong theme, focusing on maternal responsibility.

name: InRun
description: Experience the magic of classic arcade racing with an innovative open-world multiplayer system and optional Virtual Reality support that, for the first time in a driving game, produces no motion sickness.

name: Lethal Application
description: Fly through the air in the extremely inefficient way of gun recoil. The burst mode activated by pressing two attack buttons at the same time is All health, 3x attack and significantly increase charge speed Instead, full life recovery. If you're going to die, use it and bet on the reversal!

name: Super Tank Attack
description: A super addictive arcade tank shooter from Tudou Games. Protect the enesphere, destroy the enemy.

name: Lethal Operation: Episode 1 - Healer Rugitta
description: キャラをじっくり育てながら広い世界を冒険する――。 そんなSTGがあってもいいじゃないか!! …というのがこのゲームのコンセプト。 ブレイクによって敵弾を消すことができ、 レベルと装備で強くなるので、STGが苦手な人でも凶悪弾幕ボスを間違いなく倒せるようになります!

name: Chicken Scratch
description: Chicken Scratch is a quirky multiplayer drawing game set in a bird office, where you pass on a telephone chain featuring unusual prompts, muddling doodles and wacky captions.

name: Cute Capybaras
description: Spend your time with profit and pleasure! Play the puzzle game with the cutest and friendliest animal in the entire world! Find difference on pictures with capybaras!

name: Into the Flames: Retro Fire Gear 1
description:
Fight fires like it's 1980!
This pack grants you access to retro US firefighting gear.

name: Garbage Truck Driving Simulator
description: Collect all the garbage in the city with the garbage truck and enjoy the car game.

name: Dinovaporate
description: Delay the impending doom of the dinosaurs! Destroy groups of blocks by clicking. When falling magma blocks reach bottom you lose health and a vertical row. Upgrade your block level to convert falling magma blocks to normal blocks.

name: Police Car SUV Simulator
description: Police Car SUV Simulator is a police car simulation with realistic graphics. Catch criminals, take them to the police station, and customize your vehicle with the rewards you earn.

name: Real Drift Multiplayer
description: Real Drift Multiplayer is a drifting game with realistic graphics and extensive customization options. Aim for the highest scores by competing with your opponents in single and online modes.

name: Lunarpunk
description: Lunarpunk is the first Tower Attack ever made. A brand-new experience based on moving forward with your turrets to destroy the cosmic menace. Crush your enemies, develop new turrets, enhance those you have and try to overcome the crisis that desolates your world. Are you ready to push forward?

name: Raptoid
description: Raptoid is a gay scaly bdsm themed beat-em-up game and an homage to the classic video games of the 90s, featuring lots of kinky game mechanics, enemy grapples and a fighting system that was was developed with empowerment and fun in mind.

name: Idle Obelisk Miner
description: This is an idle / incremental / clicker game about mining rocks, crafting bars and progressing through vast upgrade trees to progress further into the mines.

name: Lord of Mask
description: A fantasy action RPG idle to defeat the monsters and get the masks of the gods to return to the human world!

name: Idle Space Force: Retro Clicker
description: Idle Space Force:Retro Clicker A retro idle adventure that plays like a top down shooter! Join the Idle Space Force and take a journey through space to unique 8 bit worlds as you collect enough loot to make your way back home, upgrade your ship, and discover hidden treasure along the way!

name: Hero Wars: SuperStickmanDefense
description: HERO WARS the return of the original defense game!

name: Alien Invasion: RPG Idle Space
description: Do you like survival rpg adventure games or maybe role playing fun idle games? Our app Alien Invasion: RPG Idle Space is a cool mix of different genres. If you are bored at work or at home - just download our surviving alien game and enjoy amazing gameplay. Feel like an alien, discover evolution and destroy all humans!

name: Surging Seas: Power Saga
description: Join the story of an epic pirate world in fantasy islands. The world of anime is at your fingertips! Gather your crew and make a battle plan.

name: Days Bygone: Castle Defense
description: Join the Defender in this endless Castle Defense with endless hours of non-stop action! Grow your castle against the endless waves, clashing against mobs, Titans and bosses in infinite stages and a competitive leaderboard.

name: CDO2: Dungeon Defense
description:
You are now a Chief Dungeon Officer (CDO)!
Your one and only mission is to keep your dungeon running as long as possible.
Command the Demon King and deploy monsters to keep out the hordes of heroes!

name: Darkest AFK
description: Welcome to Darkest AFK, a colorful RPG offline game with an amazing turn-based strategy adventure. With lots of mobile levels in fantasy IDLE games, this game will keep you entertained for hours. Summon a team of heroes and champions and embark on a journey among monsters and enemies in free offline games. In the RAID, you will encounter dangerous gnomes, unfriendly orcs, bands of pirates, raise elves, bloody vampires, and fiery demons! Hundreds of legendary monsters, a huge map, survival, interesting quests, and much more await you in our free RPG adventure games offline. Combat in the PvP arena with multiplayer and powerful brawls. Explore all the edges of the dungeon where you will encounter PvE role-playing offline games.

name: Ridiculous Fishing EX
description:
An updated, handcrafted game about fishing with guns, chainsaws & toasters.
Follow Billy as he tries to find redemption from his uncertain past. Chase your destiny on the high seas and embark on a heroic quest for gills and glory.
An all-new 3D Ridiculous Fishing built from the ground up by the original award-winning team, with new features:

name: Tomba! 3
description: The third installment in the series was briefly in development and was never officially announced. In an interview with series creator Tokuro Fujiwara, it was confirmed that an early alpha version was released amongst the game's developers, but any work on the game including the alpha discs were trashed with Whoopee Camp closure in 2000.

name: Hexaduel
description: Test your number skills in this magical turn-based fighter! Cast hexes in the form of hexadecimal numbers, and block those of your opponent by converting them into decimal notation. Spar alone or with a friend, or brave the gauntlet for the ultimate hexadueling challenge.

name: Sex Simulator: Beach Resort Girls
description: A steamy sex simulation game featuring visual novel elements, high definition images and videos, and realistic-looking characters, all set in a beautiful decor. You play as a woman who has sex with three different women on her vacation at a luxury resort.

name: Magical Girl Dash
description: Magical Girl Dash is a retro arcade where you fight against the forces of evil in a runner style game. Protect the city and, most important of all, recover the stolen cakes from your favorite bakery!

name: White Flame Inna: Daughter of the Void
description: 2d hand drawn female protagonist metroidvania/soulslike game

name: Daughter of a Scoundrel
description:
In this free Otome visual novel, you play as Danielle Scarletta (Name Changeable), living a relatively comfortable life until the loss of your parents.

After moving in with your grandfather, your life takes another turn - ending up with a man trying to kill you after just discovering your name.

Now staying in a mansion with six strange and dangerous men, who will you trust to be your bodyguard? Will you uncover the real reason behind your parents’ death, make new friends, and potentially a lover along the way? Or will poking your nose in places it doesn’t belong just make you end up like the rest…?

name: We Are Not Alone
description: We Are Not Alone is a new twist on horror that combines first person exploration and third person point and click adventure. As a member of a "safe" isolation experiment you'll explore an underground facility, solve puzzles and uncover the mystery of an unknown creature. Just don't make eye contact.

name: Doomsday Jetlag
description: Arcade shooter at the end of the world! Play as fighter pilots fending off the aerial hordes of hell during total nuclear apocalypse, Doomsday Jetlag combines casual bullet-hell, shoot-em-up & rogue-lite elements to maximise the fun of playing through armageddon!

name: Nomifactory
description: Nomifactory (ファクトリーのみ) is a quest-driven expert pack focused on building large-scale factories, where you will put your automation skills to the test as you progress from punching trees to creative-in-survival, climbing the power tiers of GregTech: Community Edition (GTCE) and its extension, Shadows of Greg. No complicated magic systems, no forced combat or exploration: Only Factories!

name: Surface Runner
description: A narrative driven-platformer that puts the player in the shoes of an AI that is becoming more and more sentient.

name: Beauty and The Beast: Interactive Book
description: Beauty and The Beast. Interactive classic stories for all ages.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Hitori
description:
A puzzle for connoisseurs.
Are you up for a challenge?

name: Snow White: Interactive Book
description: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs. Interactive classic stories for all ages.

name: The Kitty in The Spaceship
description:
The galaxy tour
For a huge fan of cats……
The ship is full of troubles!?

name: Legends of the Eternal Flame
description: Embark on a perilous journey to rekindle the eternal flame and save the world that is falling into chaos.

name: Psychic 5: Eternal
description:
"Five heroes with super powers, five hammers saving the world."
"At that time, Satan was not completely dead."

name: Giant Wishes
description: Follow Runi’s journey to become a giantess!

name: Zombie Hunter: D-Day
description: The apocalypse is here. Zombies flood in from all sides. You have 80 days until the rescue team arrives. Your desperate struggle for survival begins now!

name: Alien War 2 DogFight
description: The best shooting game with various perspectives.

name: Zombie Arena Survival
description: Survive in an arena where more and more zombies appear and try to kill you. Kill as many zombies as possible before they kill you.

name: Metal Gear Acid 2: Mobile 3D
description:
3D mobile game port of PSP's Metal Gear Acid 2.

Metal Gear Acid returns to your mobiles in full 3D!
In the enlarged continuation of this tactics game you are going to rescue legendary Solid Snake soldier from the USA army attacks. Moreover, this time Snake is not going to fight alone, secret bosses gave him a girl assistant, Venus.

name: Puddies
description: Are you curious to discover what lies beyond our planet? Accompany Bean on his space mission and discover an endless number of adorable creatures called Puddies that will have to be trained. Launch yourself into the unknown or you launch him.

name: Nodes Escape
description: The game presents realistic game graphics through sound effects, narration and imagination. The level design is subtle and challenging, allowing players to challenge their intelligence and logic skills in solving puzzles.

name: Medved Hellraiser 2
description: Continuation of the carbon monoxide trash shooter. The player has to go through all the levels, burning enemies with a fire ax, and shooting them with a shotgun and grenade launcher musket.

name: Gaia Survivors
description: Control a variety of robots and destroy invaders from outer space in order to save the destroyed earth! "Gaia Survivors" is a 'Shoot 'Em Up' type sci-fi rogue-lite casual game with a retro-futuristic worldview.

name: PuzzleSquare
description: A Chinese traditional ink-style puzzle game.

name: Savvy Four
description:
Savvy Four is a free to play, strategic board game for everyone. The goal is to connect four tokens to score points.

The game can be played in a web browser and is available as an app for iOS on the App Store and Android on Google Play.

To begin, players can customize their character and select a game type to play against either AI opponents of varying difficulties or a friend. Players have the option to participate in single games or join a league where each player competes against one another. The game features a ranking system that starts at Novice and progresses as players win games.

name: Metal Gear Acid: Mobile 3D
description:
3D port of PSP's Metal Gear Acid, with some missions and characters removed.

The Metal Gear Series sneaks its way to mobile! A plane has been hijacked by an unknown terrorist threat and it?s up to Solid Snake to infiltrate the enemy and put an end to this dangerous crisis. Get ready to experience deep tactical espionage as you plan out your strategy to infiltrate the enemy and accomplish missions in an entirely new Metal Gear game.

With atmospheric graphics and appearances by old familiar Metal Gear faces, Metal Gear Acid combines the renowned characteristics of your favourite stealth trip with a new emphasis on tactical turn-based strategy. This innovative approach lets you delve into the strategic side of warfare as differently themed card decks give you unique abilities and actions helping you to defeat the dangers lying ahead. Are you ready to accept your mission?

name: MM
description: A narrative game about "a man's request for a life without regrets".

name: Sector One
description: Sector One takes you on a journey through 6 different worlds, where your goal is to fly your spaceship as long as you can, neutralizing enemies on the way. Each world offers a unique visual experience but also comes with different kinds of challenges that you need to overcome.

name: Warzone of Destiny 95
description: Destiny is decided… in the Warzone. In 1995.

name: Mega Snake
description: Get bigger, but not all at once! You can also grow bigger. Aim for your goals, seize your opportunities, because time and failure can become your enemies.

name: Electation
description: In the game you need to pass the levels killing various creatures, some will run away from you, others on the contrary, will chase and attack you.

name: Johnny Trigger: Definitive Edition
description:
Johnny Trigger – International Man of Mayhem!
Dive straight in and get shooting! Johnny Trigger’s short but immensely satisfying levels make it the perfect action game to fill a short break. And if you’ve got a little more time, there’s so much to collect and a new challenge round every corner.

This action-packed experience includes content from the base game and 6 DLCs that add the skins: Lunatic, Butcher, Avenger, Hunter, Johnnybee and Hotshot along with their unique weapons: Showtime, Vengeance, Hurricane, Triforce, Bulletstorm and Sawed-off.
It also includes various in-game currencies totaling 4500 gems used to buy other currencies, 175 puzzles to unlock more comic graphics, 65 keys to open locked doors in base, 150 hammers to unlock other upgrades in base, 35000 money to buy or draw weapons and skins in shops.

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Couch Co-op Edition
description:
Jump into your food truck and business will bump up!
Test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck!

Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible.

Be careful not to burn the food!

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code - Ch. Desuhiko: Charisma Killed the Cat
description: The first DLC for Master Detective Archives: RAIN CODE is a substory that features protagonist Desuhiko Thunderbolt, and allows players to control the Master Detective with the Forensic Forte "Disguise."

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Extended Edition
description: Mixx Island Remix Plus is a high-energy, action-packed shooter set in a fantastic 2D world. Gather your wits, sharpen your reflexes, and prepare for the ultimate challenge.

name: Dessert DIY: Nasty Edition
description:
In Dessert DIY: Nasty Edition you can make desserts and seek sweet revenge!

Unlock mean ingredients to create desserts with a nasty surprise for the bad guys. Imagine adding cockroaches, ants, worms, and other yucky things to your ice cream and popsicles!

name: Hollenburg 'Hell Castle'
description:
You are Father Karras and before you return home with your parishioners, you must travel to the Austrian border and put an end to all these evil experiments.
Explore the castle of hell and defeat the four satanic generals hiding in its dark walls.
Hollenburg is an arcade with video adventure elements; Explore the huge castle, collect items, collect experience points to level up and discover hidden secrets.

name: Fun Chess: Deluxe Edition
description: Prepare for loads of fun with this cartoon version of the most popular board game in the world.

name: Neon Fantasy: Furries
description: Neon Fantasy: Furries is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: The Pixel Pulps Collection
description: Influenced by 20th century pulp fiction and styled after 1980s home computer gaming graphics, Pixel Pulps transports you to strange and cryptic worlds not unlike our own... Explore the possibilities of interactive fiction in three unique stories, Mothmen 1966, Varney Lake, and Bahnsen Knights, all set within one eerie universe, and discover a fusion of exceptionally polished writing and strikingly unique visuals.

name: PachiPara12: Daikai to Natsu no Omoide
description:
The 12th installment of the pachinko simulator series by Sanyo Bussan, a pachinko manufacturer in partnership with Irem Software Engineering. The series features pachinko machines produced by Sanyo Bussan and is known by the abbreviated title "Pachipara," starting from this installment, transitioning from its previous title, "Sanyo Pachinko Paradise."

The featured pachinko machine in this installment is "Daikai Monogatari" (The Tale of the Great Sea). Additionally, the familiar story mode, "Pachipro Fūunroku" (Pachinko Professional Chronicles), is included as the fourth installment titled "Pachipro Fūunroku 4: The Silver Ball Murder Case." The Pachipro Fūunroku series has been included since "Pachipara 8" and is characterized by elements of gal games and oddly serious storytelling (with some absurd game elements) despite being a pachinko game.

While the previous three installments had a top-down view, this installment showcases an expanded potential for the game as it adopts the same game engine as "Ponkotsu Roman Daikatsugeki Bumpy Trot," a game developed and released by the same company.

name: Wood Cube Block: Classic Casual Puzzle
description:
A classic puzzle with blocks for training logic in a modern version!
Meet the classic puzzle in a modern version! Show the skills of strategic thinking and logic to score as many points as possible!

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character - All Guys Pack
description:
Additional Character for "Goonya Monster".

- Tsukasa Tenkai/All Guys (Buster)
- Gatchman V/All Guys (Buster)
- Mari Tomari/All Guys (Buster)
- Meika Utai/All Guys (Buster)

name: Scratch Man
description: In this 2.5D obstacle dodging game Scratch Man is on a train home when he encounters his old enemy the Evil Squirrel, who has recently escaped from prison. After being knocked off the train it is up to you to dodge obstacles and catch up before it's too late.

name: Beast Dungeon
description:
A classic roguelike dungeon-crawler game with pixel graphics.

Fight your way through ten levels of a dungeon filled to the brim with aggressive monsters in order to take down the big, bad boss. The Lich Lord awaits you with powerful magic. Will you triumph, or will you become just another pile of ashes on the dungeon floor?

Gather equipment, spells, and skills to build your strength and defeat the ultimate challenge!

name: Hentai Girls: Ultimate Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world inhabited by Yui, Shirayuki, and Etsuko.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Special Edition
description:
Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!
Be a master of fishing!

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming: Definitive Edition
description: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: Fears to Fathom: Ironbark Lookout
description: Jack Nelson, a 24 year old fire lookout, transferred to a new outpost. As he settled into his new home, he couldn't shake the feeling that something was off, little did he know what was transpiring down in ironbark state park.

name: Globematcher feat. Tokidoki x Hello Kitty
description: A tokidoki and Hello Kitty match 3 puzzle game.

name: Miracle World: Fushigi no Kuni no IQ Meiro
description:
Miracle World: Fushigi no Kuni no IQ Meiro is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Wizard, which was released in Japan in 1995.

The player takes part in a TV quiz game called Miracle World Brain Power, in which he will have to answer different questions and in some trials he will have to find 5 errors in the screens before the time limit ends.

The game features more than 1500 questions and also a 2 player vs mode.

name: Fortnite: Captain Hypatia's Level Up Quest Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Show do Milhão
description: Unofficial game based on the Brazilian television show, "Show do Milhão". The game follows the "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?" and features the voice of the original Brazilian host of the TV show, Silvio Santos.

name: Restaurant Battle
description: Challenge yourself as a novice restaurateur in the face of existing competition. Open your establishment, decorate it according to your taste, manage staff and control purchases. Do everything to become the best, using honest and not very ways!

name: Primitive Society Simulator
description: In this game, you'll be the leader of an ancient tribe, guiding your people to explore the natural world, to hunt, and to farm. As culture and civilization prosper, you shall establish a tribal alliance, a community with a shared future of tribes.

name: Be-Yond: Kurodaishou ni Mirareteru
description:
When I woke up from the darkness, I learned that I was the legendary Devil of Darkness, that was said to have the power to destroy the universe.

The beautiful girls approach me one after another. My shout roars in space. When I pat a villain gently, he is discomposed into molecules... It seems that I have the power... But... am I really the Devil?

name: Evanesce
description:
A first person horror game where you play as a steward.

The main gameplay loop is based around a "weeping angels" mechanic where,

if you look away the entities will move closer to you.

Combine this with the ps1 airplane atmosphere , great sound design and an interesting narrative and you've got our game.

name: The Human Show
description: The Human Show is a spiritual successor to "The Outsiders" from the first DreadX Collection as a conflicting, collaborative asymmetrical multiplayer horror experience. Work together with other contestants to solve puzzles, avoid traps, and deal with a variety of otherworldly creatures each ‘“episode.” To keep the ratings up, the Game Master must not just torture contestants, but also collaborate with them while utilizing randomized trials and challenges every match. Plenty more are planned throughout Early Access to keep contestants expecting the unexpected.

name: The Telephone
description: The Telephone is a first-person psychological horror game that will transport you to a world governed by anxiety. You will have to explore the house in which you are locked and the mysterious town of Lonely Plain, searching for clues that can help Roberta regain her memory.

name: Kaiju Princess 2
description: Journey across the galaxy with a cute kaiju and her ravenous appetite as you collect ingredients to cook up the ultimate feast!

name: Gotouchi Hello Kitty Sugoroku Monogatari
description:
Gotouchi Hello Kitty Sugoroku Monogatari is a game developed by Sanrio Digital and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2003.
The game features 2d cartoon graphics & up to 4 human players or play against 1 or 3 computer players.

name: Snake Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Snake Deluxe 2
description: Sin descripción

name: The Simpsons: Minutes to Meltdown
description: Enter Springfield for an adventure through the hilarious world of The Simpsons! Guide Homer in a race against time as he tries to prevent a meltdown at the nuclear power plant. Interact with Bart, Mr. Burns, Apu and more of your favorite Springfielders. Avoid hazards like burning tires and giant sinkholes while you steer Homer through his fast-paced, perilous mission. Watch out for Krusty the Clown, Officer Lou and others who try to stop Homer from saving the day.

name: Miki's World: The Lost Tiara
description: Sin descripción

name: Glamour Pinball
description: Glamour Pinball is original old Nokia pinball.

name: Mr Orange
description: The goal is to help Mr Orange to reach an orange block, eliminating all obstacles along his way.

name: Red
description: A PC-98 visual novel.

name: Free Billy
description: Free Billy is a challenging physics-based puzzler about a small bright yellow colored anglerfish Bill.

name: Chicken Story 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Bit Heroes Quest
description:
Bit Heroes Quest: Pixel RPG captures that charm and nostalgia of your favorite RPG games!

Explore and battle your way through a vast open world inspired by your favorite 8-bit & 16-bit dungeon heroes and monsters.

name: Bit Reverse
description: A puzzle game with a robot that switches state of an object.

name: Time Breaker
description: Immerse yourself in the multidimensional universe of Desordre. Solve intricate puzzles, push the boundaries of 4-dimensional thinking. Get ready for a unique experience where reflection takes on a whole new dimension

name: Bloodecay
description: In the Land of Elworth, a plague called erosion emerged. It corrupts all life, brings pain and destruction ---- Becoming the knight idonia, who accepts the bloodthirsty brand, annihilat the plague claws, and destroy the ancient evil.

name: Flowfall
description: Unique puzzle/arcade game where you must fit the correct shapes into the correct gates as you fall.

name: Bird Watch: Central Park
description: Bird Watch Central Park is an Ornithology Simulator where you traverse New York City's central park in search of various bird species to fill your log. Take in the breathtaking scenery of Central Park and keep your eyes peeled for various bird species as you fully immerse yourself in Bird Watching.

name: BlazingAngel Mistletear
description: Become a transforming heroine and use various attacks and sweet combos to defeat enemies and monsters, and save your younger sister in this side-scrolling action game!

name: Doctor Cat
description: Reflect as you have fun with stories about a group of cats who after being cornered by the problems in there lives decide to go to Doctor Cat. Solve adorable jigsaws while uncovering the story of there patients

name: Makabaka
description: This is a third-person pronoun grass cutting game, a unique magic girl theme game, with the background set in a mysterious autumn forest. The player will play the role of a magical girl with a natural magical talent, facing the threat of ghoul appearing in the forest

name: Showdown 64
description: Sin descripción

name: Moorhuhn: Winter-Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tomoni
description: This is a small Game Boy puzzle game with a simple game mechanic similar to the the sliding ice puzzles found in the Pokemon games.

name: Moorhuhn Total 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure
description:
Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure is the first video game in the Skylanders series. It is a video game that is played along with toy figures that interact with it through a "Portal of Power", that reads their tag through NFC and features the voices of Josh Keaton, Dave Wittenberg, Darin De Paul, Joey Camen, Audrey Wasilewski, Keythe Farley and Kevin Michael Richardson.

The 3DS ports of the first four Skylanders games are completely different from their home console counterparts in terms of gameplay and story.

name: Skylanders: Giants
description:
Skylanders: Giants is a 2012 video game in the Skylanders series, a direct sequel to the 2011 game Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure and features the voices of Kevin Michael Richardson, Greg Ellis, Peter Lurie, Steve Blum, Dave Wittenberg, Carlos Alazraqui, Kevin Sorbo, Bobcat Goldthwait, Patrick Seitz and Julie Nathanson. It is the game before Skylanders: Swap Force. As the title suggests, it features larger Skylanders known as "Giants", along with other new gameplay mechanics.

The 3DS ports of the first four Skylanders games are completely different from their home console counterparts in terms of gameplay and story.

name: Telly Wise
description:
A strategy game where you manage you won T.V. station.

You buy or make programs, schedule them and get advertisers.

name: Skylanders: Swap Force
description:
Skylanders: Swap Force is a platformer video game developed by Vicarious Visions and published by Activision. It is the third main game in the Skylanders video game and toy franchise, following 2012's Skylanders: Giants, which was a direct sequel to 2011's Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure (the spin-off of The Legend of Spyro series). It is the game before Skylanders: Trap Team and features the voices of John DiMaggio, Jess Harnell, Audrey Wasilewski, Richard Tatum, David Sobolov, Josh Keaton, Keythe Farley, Dave Wittenberg, Joey Camen, Gregg Berger, Troy Baker and Robin Atkin Downes.

The 3DS ports of the first four Skylanders games are completely different from their home console counterparts in terms of gameplay and story.

name: Flooder
description: Can you flood the entire screen with a single color in less than 25 moves? Test your wits with this fun puzzle game.

name: Skylanders: Trap Team
description:
In Skylanders Trap Team, Kaos continues his ongoing quest to rule over Skylands. He has discovered the location of the legendary Cloudcracker Prison -- a fortress built entirely out of the magical substance Traptanium and home to Skylands’ most nefarious baddies. In an attempt to build his own army of foes, Kaos blows up the prison, releasing the most wanted villains and blasting shards of Traptanium to Earth in the form of Traps. Now it’s up to Portal Masters to recapture all of the escaped villains using powerful Traptanium Traps and defeat Kaos before it’s too late!

The 3DS ports of the first four Skylanders games are completely different from their home console counterparts in terms of gameplay and story.

name: God Of Gods
description:
"God of Gods" is a strategy game created by passionate gamers for gamers, offering a gameplay experience reminiscent of Clash Royale. Customize your deck, evolve your characters, and collect unique skills to build a truly exceptional card collection.

Engage in thrilling PvP battles to climb the ladder and establish yourself as a top player, or test your skills in challenging PvE encounters against increasingly formidable opponents.

name: Johnny Trigger: Lunatic DLC
description:
Move into action and let your enemies taste the power of Showtime gun!
Customize your appearance with Lunatic skin and pick up a new unique weapon now!

This DLC unlocks the Lunatic skin and the unique weapon Showtime.
On the Nintendo Switch this pack also includes 3000 gems (to buy other currencies) and 75 additional puzzles to unlock more comic graphics.

name: Twinkle Star Knights
description: Twinkle Star Knights is Bishoujo RPG based on the Japanese visual novel Twinkle Crusaders developed by Lillian and released in September 2008. The project is supervised and planned by game artist Rei Kannagi from Creative Team Kuma-san.

name: Five Nights at Starry
description: Can you survive all five terrifying nights at STARRY? Five Nights at Starry is a horror fan game based on Five Nights at Freddy's and Bocchi the Rock!

name: Johnny Trigger: Butcher DLC
description:
Move into action and let your enemies taste the power of Vengeance gun!
Customize your appearance with Butcher skin and pick up a new unique weapon now!

This DLC unlocks the Butcher skin and the unique weapon Vengeance.
On the Nintendo Switch this pack also includes 15 keys to open locked doors in base and 50 hammers to unlock another upgrades in base

name: Laxius Party
description: 2005, the year Blades of Heaven was released on Windows. Made by Laxius Power and published by Laxius Power, this role-playing (rpg) game is available for free.

name: Johnny Trigger: Avenger DLC
description:
Move into action and let your enemies taste the power of Hurricane gun!
Customize your appearance with Avenger skin and pick up a new unique weapon now!

This DLC unlocks the Avenger skin and the unique weapon Hurricane.
On the Nintendo Switch this pack also includes 35000 money (to buy or draw weapons and skins in shops) and 1500 gems to buy other currencies.

name: Ardentryst
description: Sin descripción

name: Johnny Trigger: Hunter DLC
description:
Move into action and let your enemies taste the power of Triforce gun!
Customize your appearance with Hunter skin and pick up a new unique weapon now!

This DLC unlocks the Hunter skin and the unique weapon Triforce.
On the Nintendo Switch this pack also includes 25 keys to open locked doors in base and 75 puzzles to unlock more comic graphics.

name: GoldenLand
description: GoldenLand is a PvP strategy card game inspired by the classic GWENT

name: Shaman King Chou Senjiryokketsu: Funbari Version
description:
Shaman King Chou Senjiryokketsu is a trading card game for the Game Boy Color. There are two versions, Meramera and Funbari that differs in the main characters of the game. The Meramera version has:

- Kaita
- Mitsuru
- Maria

name: Zlatogorye 2: Holodnye Nebesa
description: Sin descripción

name: Ripples
description: A short story about cats, cookies, and making a difference. Koda is a photographer who dislikes people. But a chance encounter with Kuu may get him thinking otherwise... and it all started with cookies. This is a short voiced kinetic novel made as a family gift.

name: More Toast!
description:
If you download only one toaster app for the iPhone, this should be it!

From the makers of the instant classic More Cowbell, More Toast gives your iPhone or iPod Touch the ability to make virtual toast.

That’s right, hot & golden brown toast popping right out of a toaster on your iPhone screen. With toaster sound effects, adjustable settings from light to dark, one or two slice capacity, and a choice of toast. Even take a photo with your camera or choose a picture from your photo library to burn onto the toast automatically.

After your toast is done, you can apply photo-realistic toppings to it, take a snapshot to share with friends, make a sandwich out of two slices, and even virtually eat it!

Amaze or confuse your friends! Have virtual toast anywhere, any time! Your iPhone does so many things, shouldn’t it make you toast as well?

Available toast types: Bread, English Muffin, Bagel, Waffle, Toaster Pastry, Strudel Pastry, French Toast, Crumpets, cinnamon raisin bread

100 toppings include: Butter, Jam, Peanut Butter, Cinnamon Sugar, Syrup, Cream Cheese, Honey, Nutella, Eggs, Bacon, Cheese, Icing, Whipped Cream, Sprinkles, Strawberries, Blueberries, Bananas, Chocolate Chips, Powedered Sugar, Lemon Curd, Butter Pats, Vegemite, Marmite, Strawberry Syrup, Chocolate Syrup, Avocado, Roast Beef and more!

name: More Pizza!
description:
From the creator of the hits More Toast and More Cowbell comes an app that lets you bake & eat virtual pizzas on your iPod Touch or iPhone! Named one of Slate.com’s “Best iPhone apps for kids”.

Turn your iPhone into a pizzeria! Choose your crust, pour on the sauce, add loads of cheese and all the toppings you want. Then bake it right there in your virtual oven, where it will come out piping hot and ready to slice.

Once you’ve made your pizza masterpiece, you can email the whole pie or just a slice to your friends, save a picture to your photos library, or serve it up on a plate and take virtual bites out of it!

You can choose the type of plate and tablecloth to serve your pizza on, to give it the ambiance it deserves.

name: More Salad!
description:
More Salad! gives you all the ingredients you need to make, eat, and share virtual salads.

First, pick your favorite plate, then load up with 50 different salad fixings, from all kinds of greens to veggies, fruit, nuts, and cheeses. Put as much or as little as you want on your plate, then shake your phone to toss it together!

Next, you can pour on 8 dressings, including classics like ranch, italian, french, caesar, thousand island, blue cheese, and oil & vinegar. If you want to coat your salad with dressing, toss it again!

Finally, add toppings like bacon bits, grilled chicken, salmon, or croutons.

When you’re done, you can virtually eat your salad, a bite at a time. Or email a photo (even including an automatically built recipe card!) to a friend.

You’ve made cupcakes, toast, and pizzas on your phone, now it’s time for a salad!

name: More Holiday Dinner!
description:
Mix stuffing, stuff your turkey, bake it and carve it. Peel potatoes, boil them and then mash them right on the screen. Or make some green bean casserole or macaroni & cheese. All your favorite sides, breads, desserts and salads are there, with fun interactive mixing, shaking, and swiping to bake.

After you’ve made the perfect meal, head from the kitchen to the dining room to serve up a plate. Add as much or as little as you want, then share your plate on Facebook or via email, or eat it by taking virtual bites. And you can always go back for seconds!

name: Super Mario Evolution
description: Super Mario Evolution is a cancelled mod for New Super Mario Bros. U. This mod aimed to make for an interesting and fun experience.

name: Lost Bits
description:
Lost Bits is a 2.5D retro platformer where you join M1L0 on his quest for the Great Legume.

Help M1L0 play through some old PC games on his quest to find the Great Legume!
lost bits is a 2.5D action platformer with charming graphics and a retro aesthetic. Explore a sunken battleship, grapple through a construction site, and fight the computer's operating system in this short game

name: Extermination Day
description:
Extermination Day is a ZDoom map pack that uses many zdoom features, and allows the player to freely make use of jumping, crouching and even rocket jumping without worrying about breaking the game flow.
The maps are specially aimed at Zandronum's online cooperative play. All maps will have 8 player start locations so a lot of people can join without causing telefrags at the start, and all maps will have almost twice as much monsters in multiplayer. Some maps will also feature Deathmatch and maybe Invasion versions.

This wad will also feature a hidden ending, that can only be achieved by finishing the game on the Ultra-Violence skill or higher.

name: Waste Labs
description:
You are the last space marine at the Nuke Testing base on the Moon all of your friends are dead and you only have a pistol, so what are you gonna do about it?

Waste Labs is a megawad for Doom 1 with 3 episodes.

name: Alterlight
description: After the land has been plagued by a mysterious presence that has sucked all the color out of it, you must help Ash to unlock his powers and restore the color using the crystalline scepter, use your special character abilities to solve the unique puzzles laid ahead of you and be a hero.

name: Pause To Play
description: A puzzle game where the role of the pause menu is reversed!

name: Feng-Shui Master
description: Feng-Shui Master is a 1996 city-building simulation game where the player as a trainee in the art of feng-shui, is tasked with using feng-shui to build prosperous cities over numerous stages.

name: Nibblet
description: A fun little game where you must eat all the dots, but at the same time avoiding your ever growing tail!

name: Super Pocket: Taito Edition
description:
A handheld from Blaze Entertainment's under their brand HyperMegaTech. The handhelds are compatible with Evercade cartridges and each edition has a different bundle of built-in games.

The 17 games contained in the Taito Edition are Space Invaders, Bubble Bobble, Operation Wolf, The NewZealand Story, Rastan, Cadash, Chack'n Pop, Don Doko Don, Elevator Action, Football Champ, Growl, Kiki Kaikai, Legend of Kage, Liquid Kids, Space Invaders ‘91, Volfied amd The Fairyland Story

name: Super Pocket: Capcom Edition
description:
A handheld from Blaze Entertainment's under their brand HyperMegaTech. The handhelds are compatible with Evercade cartridges and each edition has a different bundle of built-in games.

The 12 games contained in the Capcom Edition are 1942, 1943, 1944 : The Loop Master, Bionic Commando, Captain Commando, Street Fighter II’: Hyper Fighting, Strider, Wolf of the Battlefield: MERCS, Mega Man, Final Fight, Ghouls ‘n Ghosts and Forgotten Worlds

name: Derby
description:
Jump into your virtual park to play baseball from the comfort of your home. Play ball with your friends from across the world! Practice your swing, home runs and trick shots. Spawn infinite pitches in this virtual batting cage and take as many swings as you’d like!

Derby uses custom baseball physics, making VR baseball feel more real than ever before!

name: Strange Investigations: Secrets Can be Deadly - Collector's Edition
description: Join Dane, the intrepid investigator, as she unravels the truth and grapples with what to believe in this haunting story from imagination to reality!

name: Puzzle Together: Jigsaw Super Variety Pack
description: Unlock 20 puzzles depicting a wide variety of themes! Relax making these puzzles on your own or with friends and family. In addition to unlocking 20 unique puzzles (a $15 value if purchased in-game), this Super Pack also comes with 3 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

name: Underworld Adventures
description: Underworld Adventures is an excellent 2D adventure game, with RPG elements, in which you need to destroy an ancient evil and free your country from terrible monsters.

name: Fung
description: Nurture your mesmerizing slime mold and dive into the depths of a radiation-soaked realm, harnessing its energy. Whatever you do, do not stop feeding the Fung!

name: Heros and Monsters
description: Auto Battler, Clicker, Idle Game

name: T10X Car Simulator
description: Electric car simulation with high quality graphics.

name: Wizard World
description: World of Wizards: Fighting the Morvagore Demon of Hell offers rich graphics, captivating plot and exciting gameplay that provides hours of adventure and entertainment. Will players be able to defeat Morvagora and save the world from destruction? It depends on their skills, courage and determination!

name: Scopaesthesia
description: Join your friends or go it alone in this cooperative horror game. Collect pieces of evidence to uncover a mysterious disappearance, all while an unknown entity lurks in the shadows. Venture through a variety of environments, gathering what you can to progress and complete your objective...

name: Causal Effect
description: This is a text-based deduction game. Your choices will change the development of events, make up different timelines, and lead to different endings. Your primary task is to sort out the cause-and-effect relationships between events from textual descriptions.

name: As I Began to Dream
description: As I Began to Dream is an enchanting puzzle-platformer that merges a unique environment manipulation mechanic. Utilize this power to navigate dream worlds, solve puzzles, and aid Lily's escape from her dream realm.

name: Zombiolence
description: A rotten world, in which despair and extreme survival come together in order to end the largest plague of Zombies ever seen. Face them all, in order to save humanity from its end. Buy, improve and plan a strategy to kill each and every one of them. Do you have what it takes to get it?

name: Thriller Garden
description: Inspired by Vampire Survivor. you need to complete various tasks in the raging waves of monsters. During the mission process, you can choose appropriate enhancement options from 120+ unique non-numerical upgrade options to amplify the character's advantages or cover up the disadvantages.

name: Stoneman's Adventure
description: Enter an island full of puzzles and secrets as a stoneman and explore by harnessing the power to generate and manipulate stones. The gameplay is an unique combination of sokoban and one-line drawing.

name: Save Room: The Merchant
description: Immerse yourself in the Save Room, a place of safety and respite. Master inventory management while interacting with the enigmatic merchant. Buy, sell, and acquire crucial items to conquer every challenge. Not only will you need cash, but you'll need GUTS to finish this game!

name: I am Rabbit
description: 3D Flatformer Cute Adventure Rabbit Game Traverse captivating landscapes from forests to cities, seas, skies, and even the moon itself ! Enjoy charming low-polygon graphics ! Overcome challenging traps!

name: Battlepopes
description: Battlepopes is a multiplayer online 2D MOBA in a sidescrolling arena, featuring cooldown-based combat. Stuck in hell forever, as punishment for their wicked lives, ancient Popes and Antipopes fight in the eternal inferno. Come rot.

name: SeaFeud
description: SeaFeud is an underwater arcade racing game where players ride on a variety of fast fish. Swap fish mid-race to dynamically change your abilities, items, and stats. With eight different characters and three different courses to select from, players can have endless fun racing the seas.

name: A Normal Home in Ohio
description: A fabulous puzzle house escape game where you can experience Horror and Comedy together.

name: Screams from the Past
description: Uncover the dark past of an orphanage, gather clues and evidence, solve puzzles, and unveil the truth in a gripping suspense game. Your main mission is to unravel the mystery. Get ready for shocking revelations as you immerse yourself in the intriguing and chilling atmosphere.

name: Emergency Crew 3: Perfect Getaway - Collector's Edition
description: Our heroes are finally taking their well-deserved vacation to a chic tropical paradise! But alas, a major earthquake interrupts their vacation before it even starts and turns a secluded tourism destination into an isolated disaster area.

name: Casting Shadows
description: Eris has had a rough life, and to her it feels like she's just living day to day, trying to make things work. She has always had a hard time connecting with others, but soon she will learn to put her trust into an unlikely source and will discover her destiny is hiding in the shadows.

name: Call of Outlaws
description: Explore a truly enormous Wild West frontier full of cowboys, bandits. Realistic great story.

name: Medieval Clicker Blacksmith
description:
Welcome to the first Medieval Clicker adventure, a game where you’ll be able to craft the most epic fantasy weapons ever as a talented blacksmith!
Wield the Legendary Hammer and join Talkor the medieval blacksmith and her daughter Vala in this adventure forging the most rare materials and therefore, crafting amazing medieval weapons.

Click and tap! That will be the only way your blacksmith will be able to forge epic medieval weapons nonstop!

name: Stickman Ragdoll
description:
Stickman: "Where're my leg? My head? You hit it down again? ..."
This is a casual, skillful game where you manage him, break and destroy the transport and different requisites! Make incredible tricks, crash into the walls, destroy the vehicles and have fun!
You will come across realistic physics in the game, full of mastership and speed. Destruction are close to real life. Prove that you are the best of the best on the planet! Entertain your stickman more and more! Try realistic and full of events crash atmosphere in the game, made in the best traditions of stickman destruction games! Make incredible tricks, and open new levels!

name: Raccoon Pizza Rush
description:
Rocky has a business proposition for you! Help him start a New York City food delivery service in this fast paced action game. Food on demand is a big business in the city that never sleeps! You’ll begin by delivering pizza, but new friends will help Rocky expand by bringing their favorite treats like ice cream and sushi. Deliver pizza, grow your business, and take the Big Apple by storm.

Enjoy one tap input in this simple side scrolling runner. Hold down to stop Rocky from getting crushed by traffic. He just wants to keep running, but you’ve got to get him to his destination with both him and the pizza intact.

name: Exotic Traffic Racer: FastLane
description:
Exotic Traffic Racer pits your driving skills in an endless highway as you dodge and drive past incoming cars in both the left and right lanes.
We've simplified the controls to only two options. Touch the left of your screen to drive left and touch the right of your screen to drive right.
Challenge and compete with your friends and conquer the leaderboards.
Purchase and collect various cars for sale using in-game money.

name: Infinite Ancient: Room Escape
description:
Infinite Ancient Doors Escape is a combination of point and click type classical room escape games of different locations. These escape games are logically developed with tricky puzzles, adventure location, messy clues, and obscured-hidden objects to enter into the clue of Best Escape games. These games will surely test your brain logical and analytical skills. These Free rooms and doors escape games are designed in the sense of real fun, hi-fi scenes, more thrilling twists, challenging and exciting soundtracks to make you addicted and crazy for the escape game lovers.
Can you Escape 150 in 1 Infinite Ancient Doors Escape?

name: Hunt: Showdown - The Prescient Night
description:
This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter and three Legendary weapons:

- The Prescient (one Hunter)
- The Forewarning (one weapon)
- Moon Bleached (one weapon)
- The Blindside (one weapon)

name: Exoprimal: Deluxe Edition
description: Exoprimal is an online, team-based action game that pits humanity's cutting-edge exosuit technology against history's most ferocious beasts - dinosaurs.​​

name: Days End: Becoming Blackbird
description: Becoming Blackbird is a story about how the player joined the blackbirds when has no where else to go to.

name: Powerstar Golf: City Park
description: This item expands your Powerstar Golf experience with a new course, 3 new characters, new career events, and more!

name: For Honor: Year 1 - Heroes Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Powerstar Golf: Burning Sands
description: This item expands your Powerstar Golf experience with a new course, a new character, new career events, and more!

name: Rider Worlds
description:
Feast your eyes with brand new 3D graphics, and unleash your riding skills throughout the unique Worlds of Rider Worlds. Each of them provides a unique riding experience, and offers lots of content to unlock!
Grab one of the 18 unique vehicles and start flipping through 150 killer challenges!
Pimp your favorite bike with 144 custom looks and finishes to make it one of a kind!

name: Lumen Rider
description:
Prepare for the ultimate adrenaline-fueled battles like never before!
Engage in exhilarating combat, soaring through the air on your bike!
Equip yourself with powerful weapons and embrace the rush.
Hold your breath, take aim, and unleash your skills when foes emerge.
From explosive bombs to lethal discs and blazing fire, a wide array of weapons awaits your command.
Conquer cities, deserts, ruins, and futuristic metropolises, and claim victory as your own.

name: Men in Pants
description:
Strap on those pants and get ready to settle any dispute by launching yourself further than your friends (or enemies) without falling to your doom.
Who's buying the next beer? Let Men in Pants decide.
Whose turn is it to make the coffee? Get Men in Pants involved.
Whose goat is this? Men in Pants will solve all of your farmyard debates.
Got an allergy to polyester? No problem, our pants are 100% organic cotton.

name: Super Golf World
description:
Put your skills to the test in Super Golf World with 18 challenging holes. Master 2D finger physics as you refine your shots to work out the best approach to each hole. Each course offers a new challenge as you swing your driver for the final putt.
Enjoy Super Golf World!

name: Pixel Pro Golf
description: Pixel Pro Golf is a wonderfully unique arcade golf game, that combines realistic physics with zen-like gameplay and beautiful pixel-art. It can be played online, over iMessage, or as a single player experience.

name: Split the Ball
description:
Split the Ball is puzzle game where player test their reflex through a series of obstacles at high speed. Manipulate the ball through various obstacles in each puzzle level using action like splitting, merging, shrinking, phasing, etc.
Challenge yourself through 80 levels across 4 level pack themes, daily puzzle and endless arcade. Are you fast enough to navigate the ball through each obstacle?

name: Two or More!
description:
Two or More! is a puzzle game in which players connect and remove colored blocks to earn points!
Connect blocks of the same color horizontally or vertically -- or use a combination of both. The more blocks that are connected at once, the higher the score. Earn bonuses for having fewer blocks remaining at the end of each level. Challenge friends to see who can get to the top of the leaderboards.

name: Reflow
description:
Reflow is a new way to play with your iDevice and the world! Using the realtime camera image, the game abstracts your environment into a black and white level. Let virtual fluids flow on everything that meets your cameras eye. Use whatever you like - friends, objects, pets, strangers - to solve the given challenges in the most unique way. Play wherever you want - parties, bars, parks, schools, the office - do it alone or collaboratively with friends and colleges. Share your solution pics online via twitter, facebook, email and other services or compete for high-scores with players worldwide using Game Center.
Just give it a shot: Level with your world! Now!

name: Landslide
description:
"Landslide - by Cozy Labs" takes you on an exhilarating adventure as Cozy and friends skateboard down the slopes of an erupting volcano! Strap on your skateboard, gather your courage, and prepare for a thrilling endless skater experience like no other.

Dodge obstacles, navigate treacherous paths, and collect shimmering coins as you descend through the volcanic terrain. Watch out for massive rocks that stand in your way – unleash epic power-ups to clear your path! Execute daring tricks and grind on rails to showcase your skills and boost your score to new heights.

name: Among Water: Meditation Idle
description: Join the cat fisherman on an exciting sea adventure in this cat game. Dive into the animal ocean and collect valuable treasures while uncovering its secrets. Upgrade your boat and fishing skills to make your quest more enjoyable. Discover whole new world with lighthouses in this thrilling mobile pocket game that cat lovers will adore.

name: Police Cop Hot Pursuit
description: The Chase is On: Police Hot Pursuit!

name: Moto Racer Simulator GT Games
description: Get ready to embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through the world of Motorbikes racing in our groundbreaking new game - Moto Racer Simulator GT Games.Take control of your destiny as you delve into the realm of motorcycle customization. You can customize every detail of your moto to match your personal style and maximize its performance on the track.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Even Immortality Ends
description:
Version 1.2 of Honkai: Star Rail, which included:
• New characters: Blade, Kafka and Luka
• New main story quest: Topclouded Towerthrust
• New areas: Alchemy Commission and Scalegorge Waterscape
• New companion missions for Kafka and Yukong
• New events, including Tales of the Fantastic,Underground Treasure Hunt and Where Are You, Mystery Trotter?
• …and more!

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Amazing Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Brain Memory: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: SecretHitler.io
description:
Play the hit board game in your browser!
Secret Hitler is a dramatic game of political intrigue and betrayal set in 1930's Germany. Players are secretly divided into two teams - liberals and fascists. Known only to each other, the fascists coordinate to sow distrust and install their cold-blooded leader. The liberals must find and stop the Secret Hitler before it is too late.

name: Sorry, We Have A Policy
description: A short and unhappy game about trying to get trans healthcare. The goal is to try to get to the front of the line without dying.

name: Lumine Night
description: LumineNight is a story-driven detective adventure. Play as Detective Foster and his daughter to solve a series of murders spanning a decade. Interrogate suspects, infiltrate locations, solve puzzles, and gather evidence from crime scenes. Uncover the dark truth behind these killings.

name: Snake
description: Snake is a homebrew version of the arcade game developer for the SG-1000.

name: Rayne the Rogue
description: As a child Rayne watched the rich from the streets of the village and burned with jealousy. After years and years of poverty an idea formed. Rayne has decided to sneak into the lairs of dragons and steel their treasures. Rayne need your help to navigate the dangerous caves and avoid the dragon’s breath to become the wealthiest person in the village, but take heed, the further Rayne gets the more treacherous it will be.

name: 20 Doors
description: 20 Doors is an exploration, action and puzzle solving adventure where strange events and environments make you question your sanity.

name: Spies in the Night
description:
Well, hello there!! My name is Starling, Ray Starling. I love sounding all James-Bondy. I'm here to tell you a little secret. I have an odd job, by odd job I mean I kill people and blow things up. Now killing people for money is frowned upon and anyone with any common sense would turn their backs on it. For me, this job, THIS JOB, is my crowning moment. How many people can say that the President of the United States hand-picked YOU for your unique resume.

You see, there are a bunch of bad guys in a military base doing bad things to some good people. I am going to stop them. Now here's my plan, one I hope you agree with. So listen up and let me tell you...

name: Naval Campaigns Spanish-American War
description:
The Spanish-American War of 1898 marked the rise of one Great Power and the fall of another. This conflict, spurred on by colonial ambitions and the infamous destruction of the USS Maine, was decided at sea in two short and brutally decisive engagements at Manila Bay and Santiago de Cuba. With no ability to support their troops abroad, Spain admitted defeat within just five months.

The war took place during a period of unprecedented changes in naval technology and doctrine, with stark differences from one ship to the next. Both sides suffered from a variety of unforeseen challenges, be it from lack of experience or preparedness. In the end, the numerical, qualitative and home-field advantages carried the day for the United States.

But what if events had turned out differently? In addition to the two historical and rather one-sided battles, this game also depicts many hypothetical situations in which commanders made different decisions at key moments or had more resources to work with. Spanish soldiers fought gallantly even with their serious handicaps. When given better tools and tactics, perhaps they could have changed the course of history?

name: Baron of Shell
description: Baron of Shell is an expert-difficulty Kaizo hack of Super Mario World focused on shell physics.

name: Twisted Metal
description: A digital re-edition of the classic action game from PlayStation, which initiated the so-called "vehicular combat" genre. Originally released on the PlayStation in 1995, the game is only available in digital form as part of PSOne Classics.

name: Il Maniero Spettrale
description:
"Many brave adventurers have traveled to this manor. They never made it back. Enter the manor and rescue their souls."

"Il Maniero Spettrale" was originally made for the Halloween Level Design Contest (HLDC) 2014, in which it won first place. It's a single large level with a "Metroidvania" structure, inspired by the likes of Luigi's Mansion, Castlevania: Symphony of the Night and Banjo-Kazooie. The goal is to find the souls of the adventurers who visited the manor, and lead them to their eternal rest. For Halloween 2018, this was updated and released as a standalone hack, in order to make it more accessible to new players. There are several small improvements and fixes over the original and some rooms have been redesigned.
A homebrew version of 2048 on the Sega Master System.
